datafield.subfield: Cannot identify with: Renner, Peter, b. 1861; address in 1885: Freetown, Sierra Leone.

Reports, notes of cases & proceedings and judgments in appeals, etc., and references under rules, orders & ordinances relating to the Gold Coast Colony, and the colony of Nigeria, from 1861 to 1914, 1915:

v. 1, pt. 1, t.p. (Peter Awoonor Renner, of Lincoln's Inn, Barrister-at-law, and of the University of London; practitioner of the Supreme Court, Gold Coast Colony, leader of the bar, President of the Gold Coast Bar)
British Library integrated catalogue, viewed June 10, 2012
Who was who, a cumulated index, 1897-1980
